item.description: Justice Brandeis- "The People's Lawyer" Gary Highlander,PhD is a professor of American History at Stonehill College, in Easton, MA where he specializes as a Presidential Historian. He is a frequent lecturer at library forums, historical societies, senior centers, and community and professional organizations. Date: October 23, 2011 Time: 2:00-3:00 Cost $5.00 per person
item.name: Sunday afternoons @ Temple Beth Shalom in Framingham
